synopsis.text: Koji's daughter, Youko, unexpectedly finds herself in charge of the charming Rainy Color cafe when her father decides to embark on a solo trip to Hawaii. On an otherwise tranquil day, Youko storms into the cafe, furious at her father for breaking his promise to take her along. Upon seeing the cafe's mascot dog, Rain, she is paralyzed with fear, as she has a phobia of dogs. In her haste to escape, she trips over a suitcase, knocking over a precious vase. As a consequence, Youko is tasked with managing the cafe during her summer vacation. Join Youko and her friends in this heartwarming tale of personal growth, camaraderie, and the magic of helping others, all set in the delightful Rainy Color cafe.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
